review: This Review is Purely my opinion,This game is based in Germany in 2012 as you, the bus driver, it may be boring for some people who like to rush through games, However i will recommend this game to people who would like to roleplay being a bus driver.In Bus Simulator 2012 there is no ending to it, as it is a game that has unlimited missions in it.  This game is as shown $9.99 & if you buy this game & not like it well it is not the end of the world as it is a reasonably good buget priced game.There are though the odd couple of bugs & glitches that may force you to restart the game, but they are quite rare & you will often play the game without experiencing any stuff ups.

One of the best games that i have on my account, think of it like Kerbal Space Program meets Minecraft/Star Citizen.It also has multiplayer & also has Steam Workshop support so you can mod it even easier.I would reccomed it to anyone who likes Star Wars, Star Trek and space itself.8 out of 10 Fluffy Dice.
